content.en: Optimized plant extraction: Scientists have been using algorithms to optimize the extraction of beneficial compounds from various plants. These algorithms, such as artificial neural networks and response surface methodology, help determine the best conditions for extracting phenolic compounds, polyphenolic compounds, and other bioactive components. By using these algorithms, researchers can improve the efficiency and effectiveness of the extraction process, leading to the development of more potent and valuable plant-based products.
content.da: Optimeret planteekstraktion: Forskere har brugt algoritmer til at optimere udvindingen af gavnlige forbindelser fra forskellige planter. Disse algoritmer, såsom kunstige neurale netværk og responses overflade metoder, hjælper med at fastslå de bedste betingelser for at udvinde phenoliske forbindelser, polyfenoliske forbindelser og andre bioaktive komponenter. Ved at bruge disse algoritmer kan forskerne forbedre effektiviteten og virkningen af udvindingsprocessen, hvilket fører til udviklingen af mere potente og værdifulde plantebaserede produkter.
